DOC.brief_summary: The aim observational study retrospectively collect current survival data 3995 primary rectal cancer patient extract 5097 rectal cancer patient admit Cancer Hospital , Chinese Academy Medical Sciences January 2000 December 2010 . Moreover , base Cox model , want develope nomogram predict local recurrence , distant metastasis , survival patient rectal cancer treat pre- postoperative chemoradiotherapy ( CRT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Patients With Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Aged old 18 year American Joint Committee Cancer ( six edition ) stage I IV disease Received either transabdominal resection , transanal excision , preoperative radiotherapy chemoradiotherapy Had histologic subtypes adenocarcinoma ( otherwise specify , mucinous mucinproducing , mixed cell mixed subtypes , tubular , papillary ) Had histologic subtypes squamous cell carcinoma , carcinoid , neuroendocrine tumor , small cell carcinoma , leiomyosarcoma , sarcoma , gastrointestinal stromal sarcoma , melanoma , carcinosarcoma , rhabdoid tumor , malignant peripheral nerve sheet tumor Only receive palliative surgery colostomy , sigmoidostomy Received palliative radiotherapy chemoradiotherapy metastatic disease With unresectable distant metastasis liver , lung , bone , central nervous system , peritoneal transplantation Had detail medical record
